lom:description.lom:string:
Report on National Academy workshop. "Going green is a hot topic in both chemistry and chemical engineering. Green chemistry is the design of chemical products and processes that reduce or eliminate the use and generation of hazardous substances."
Authors: Paul Anastas, Frankie Wood-Black, Tina Masciangioli, Ericka McGowan, and Laura Ruth, Editors, Chemical Sciences Roundtable, National Research Council

lom:title.lom:string: Exploring Opportunities in Green Chemistry and Engineering Education: A Workshop Summary to the Chemical Sciences Roundtable
